name: Rodent Crossing: COVID Edition
description:
This is a journey of a rat who has to head home, in order to escape quarantine.

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Don't get hit by humans or traffic

Move up till you reach home!

Use coins to buy powerups/cheats in the Supermarket

Tip: You can hop diagonally on lilipads

This is a game made in 24 hours, submitted as part of Ludum Dare 46.

Made by Ying Zhi (Programming) and Chris Lee (Art)

If you enjoyed it, please rate and leave a comment on https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/rodent-crossing-covid-edition
